db:abstract.db:para: Information about the Sensorfw sensor backend.

db:article.db:para: The Sensorfw sensor backend requires the Sensorfw and sensor daemon. Sensorfw was originally used in MeeGo, and is available on : https://github.com/mer-packages/sensorfw
To compile the sensorfw backend, you need sensorfw installed and run qmake with CONFIG+=sensorfw
